name: Primordial Godwrath
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You can only spend 1 AP each turn casting this spell. When you take damage, the spell gains 1 AP. You can cast the spell at any amount of AP.

When you cast this spell, lava erupts from beneath you, engulfing you and a 5 foot radius cylinder 20 feet tall centered on you. For each AP the spell has, the radius increases by 5 feet and the cylinder height by 20 feet. Creatures in range other than you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6+4 fire damage per AP spent, halved on a success.

The affected area becomes lava as per the Lava Flow spell, remaining for 1 hour. You gain 5 temporary hit points per AP spent as well as fire immunity for 1 minute.

You can cast this spell at any AP count.
empower: Adds 3 AP to the spell. Your concentration can't be broken while casting this spell.
